#Leslie Matrix Example

Model population changes using the same example we did in lecture

```{r}

insect_leslie <- matrix(data = c(0, 0, 600, 0.2, 0, 0, 0, 0.08, 0), 
                        byrow=TRUE, ncol=3, nrow=3)
insect_leslie
```
